features: 🎽【Mini Washing Machine】The portable washing machine measures 11.4 x 8.7 x 8.7 inches when unfolded, and 5.1 x 8.7 x 8.7 inches when folded. With a capacity of 7L, it can deeply clean baby clothes, underwear, socks and other small clothing. The mini washing machine frees your hands and leaves you with more leisure time.

🎽【Portable Washing Machine】This travel washing machine is recommended for washing socks, underwear, towels, swimsuits, baby clothes and other small items. Not recommended for washing the following types of clothing, such as jeans, coats, bathrobes and other bulky items.

🎽【Safe Portable Washing Machine】Made of ABS and TPR materials, this portable washing machine is suitable for washing your personal belongings, baby clothes, and toys. Mini washing machines not only save water but are also more energy efficient than traditional washing machines. Effectively removes stains from clothing.

🎽【Mini Foldable Design】The camping washing machine is small when folded, takes up no space and is easy to store. Equipped with a high-speed motor, it can accelerate the separation of liquid and stains and clean clothes quickly. Environmentally friendly and corrosion-resistant, it is a must-have for traveling and camping.

🎽【Automatic Protection】The apartment mini washing machine has 3 levels of cleaning time (1, 5, 10 minutes). With automatic protection function. If it gets stuck, it will sound an alarm and shut down automatically. 12 Month Warranty, 24 Hours Friendly Customer Support, if you have any questions, please contact us, we will provide you with satisfactory customer service.
body.description: Upgraded 7L Mini Portable Washing Machine What's In The Box ‎1 x 7L Mini Washing Machine 1 x Drain Basket 1 x Drain Hose 1 x Power Cord 1 x User's Manual 💓Powerful stain removal: This washing machine provides a full range of imitation hand scrubbing, precise washing speed, and powerful decontamination effects. Perfect for washing small items like baby clothes, underwear or socks to keep you and your family healthy! 💓Not recommended: jeans, long skirts, bathrobes and other bulky clothes. 💓Reminder: It is a small washer but not a dryer. Using the drain basket can shake off excess water and keep clothing from dripping, but the clothing are still damp and the washer have no drying function.
